About Us

Duy Anh Nghiem

I took my sister to get her eyebrows done by Ms.Emily last Friday and she was really happy with the results. Emily gave her details and advised her gently to choose the perfect color that matches her face, and I was surprised that my sister was happy, even snoring throughout the process since she could not bear a single needle, and the outcome was so natural that I couldn't tell that it was a tattoo. I highly recommend Vy Brows Beauty if you want to have a better appearance.
